00007 #define RCH    struct ReturnCommandHandler

00009 static inline void rchInsert(struct list_head* head, RCH* new_entry) 
00010 {
00011 //      info( "new %p lock %p LOCK", new_entry, new_entry->lock );
00012         spin_lock(new_entry->lock);
00013         list_add(&new_entry->list, head);
00014         spin_unlock(new_entry->lock);
00015 //      info( "new %p lock %p unlock", new_entry, new_entry->lock );
00016 }
00017 
00018 static inline void rchAppend(struct list_head* head, RCH* new_entry)
00019 {
00020 //      info( "new %p lock %p LOCK", new_entry, new_entry->lock );
00021         spin_lock(new_entry->lock);
00022         list_add_tail(&new_entry->list, head);
00023         spin_unlock(new_entry->lock);
00024 //      info( "new %p lock %p unlock", new_entry, new_entry->lock );
00025 }

00027 static inline void rchRemove( RCH* rch )
00028 {
00029         spin_lock(rch->lock);
00030         
00031         dbg(1, "rch %p list_del %p", rch, &rch->list);
00032         list_del(&rch->list);
00033         rch->path = 0;
00034         rch->handler = 0;
00035         spin_unlock(rch->lock);
00036 }
00037    
00038 static inline int rchRemoveIfNotValid(RCH *rch)
00040 {
00041         int valid;
00042 
00043         spin_lock(rch->lock);
00044         valid = rch->rchReturn.valid;
00045         if (valid != 1){
00046                 dbg(1, "rch %p valid: %d list_del %p", rch, valid, &rch->list);
00047 
00048                 // valid == 0 => cleanup on timeout 
00049                 if (valid < 0){
00050                         list_del(&rch->list);
00051                 }
00052                 rch->handler = 0;
00053         }
00054         spin_unlock(rch->lock); 
00055         return valid;
00056 }

00058 void rchInit(struct Acq200Device* device, RCH* rch);
00061 static inline struct Acq200Path* rchSetSamplesAndGetPath(
00062         RCH *rch, unsigned id, int nsamples)
00063 {
00064         struct Acq200Path *path;
00065 
00066         spin_lock(rch->lock);
00067         if (nsamples == 0xffffffff){
00068                 rch->rchReturn.valid = -1;
00069         }else{
00070                 rch->rchReturn.start_id = id;
00071                 rch->rchReturn.nbytes = nsamples*2;
00072                 rch->rchReturn.valid = 1;
00073         }       
00074 
00075         path = rch->path;
00076         spin_unlock(rch->lock);
00077 
00078         return path;
00079 }
